data.name: Dungeon Defenders II - Permafrost Costume Pack
data.detailed_description:
Collect the entire array of ice-bound costumes with the Permafrost Pack. This pack includes an ice-themed costume for ten heroes in Dungeon Defenders II.

Frostbite Knight Squire
Ice Mage’s Regalia Apprentice
Borean Stalker Huntress
Zen Frost Gi Monk
Cryo Lord Abyss Lord
Sub-0 Suit EV2
Ice Witch’s Garb Gunwitch
Frost Fire Flux Lavamancer
Hailstorm Mystic
Forestfrost Dryad

This pack does not include the base heroes.

data.short_description: Collect the entire array of ice-bound costumes with the Permafrost Pack.  This pack includes an ice-themed costume for ten heroes in Dungeon Defenders II.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1)
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2600 or better / NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better, 512 MB video memory, with Shader Model 3 support
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1) / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Quad-Core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 or AMD Radeon HD 4770 or better (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound device
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection is required to play.
